dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3176 IH: To amend the John D. Dingell, Jr. Conservation, Management, and Recreation Act to reauthorize the National Volcano Early Warning and Monitoring System.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Begich introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the John D. Dingell, Jr. Conservation, Management, and Recreation Act to reauthorize the National Volcano Early Warning and Monitoring System.

section.header: National Volcano Early Warning and Monitoring System reauthorization
section.text: Section 5001(c) of the John D. Dingell, Jr. Conservation, Management, and Recreation Act (43 U.S.C. 31k(c)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking United States Geological Survey and inserting Secretary; and
by striking 2019 through 2023 and inserting 2026 through 2030; and
by striking National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration and inserting Secretary of Commerce; and
by striking 2023 through 2024 and inserting 2026 through 2030.
